name: qLib
tagline: An open source library for SideFX Houdini.
body:
### Welcome Houdinistas!

You can download **qLib** from here. But is's better to use **Git**!

Installing **Git**:

* On **Linux** use your distributions package manager.
* On **OS X** use [Git for OS X](http://code.google.com/p/git-osx-installer/).
* On Windows use [Git for Windows](http://msysgit.github.com/), which comes with an acceptable shell also (bash).

Open a shell and clone the repository:

```
$ git clone https://github.com/qLab/qLib.git
```

Later if you want to update the library just go into your cloned repository and run the following:

```
$ cd qLib
$ git pull
```

We hope that you will enjoy **qLib**!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
